item.description:
Anyone want to meet before/after the Warren Miller films at Somerville Theatre? Tickets to the movie are $20 and you will need to order online on your own. Show starts at 7pm.

We will meet at 6pm at the Orleans Bar/resturant for a beer. since it is general seating I think we should get in line by 6:30pm so we can get a decent seat and sit together. If you miss us don't worry, we will meet Orleans after the show for drinks, food and to watch the Patriots game. maybe stay and listen to some live music.

http://www.orleansres...

Jeep Presents Warren Miller's Children of Winter.
http://www.somerville...

group.name: Boston Ski, Snowboard, and Outdoor Adventurers Meetup Group

item.name: Warren Miller movie in Somerville
